text:
e="preserve">Nika Kiladze (29 November 1988 – 7 October 2014) was a Georgian footballer. He played professionally in both Georgia and Finland from 2006 until his death in 2014. He played as a defensive midfielder for Orbebi Tbilisi, Kokkolan Palloveikot (KPV), Kajaanin Haka, and FC Guria Lanchkhuti.
Kiladze was born in Gagra, Abkhaz ASSR, Georgian SSR of the Soviet Union.
Kiladze died in a motorcycle accident on 7 October 2014 in Tbilisi. He was 25.
